Yo Dan...general bugzilla tip: if you need creative resources for a project (like this one, I assume), it's better to file it with the component design or copy. That way Tara & I see it automatically and we can fit it into our schedule. Otherwise, we doesn't appear on our radar.

If this is a general tracking bug with more details to follow, that's fine, but if this is the creative bug I'd recommend making that update.
comments.author: jslater@mozilla.com
